meal_styles.breakfast: Focus on nutritional awakening, high protein, low GI, rich in dietary fiber light meal combinations, avoid being too greasy, provide stable energy for the whole day.
meal_styles.lunch: Key period for energy replenishment, flavors can be rich, recommend balanced combination of high-quality carbs and meat/protein, satisfy satiety and energy needs for afternoon work/study.
meal_styles.dinner: Focus on easy digestion and nutritional repair, control oil and refined carb intake, more vegetables less oil/salt, reduce burden on stomach, promote night metabolism.
